headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LAREUSE, JEAN (AKA JEAN LLAREUS)

snippet: LAREUSE--Jean (aka Jean LLAREUS), 91, of Princeton, NJ and Prats-de-Mollo, France, passed away peacefully at University Medical Center of Princeton on Friday, June 17, 2016. Jean was an accomplished and world-renowned artist from the South of France who moved to the United States to marry his beloved wife, Caroline. Services are under the direction of The Mather-Hodge Funeral Home, Princeton, NJ 08542. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LAREUSE--Jean (aka Jean LLAREUS), 91, of Princeton, NJ and Prats-de-Mollo, France, passed away peacefully at University Medical Center of Princeton on Friday, June 17, 2016.
